channel.title: Opening Command Prompt (When its disabled)
channel.description:
I saw some people asking it so meh,i can help.
First up go to this directory:
[code]START>All programs>accessories>notepad(.exe)[/code]
Now you have notepad opened,type in the following, [code]COMMAND.COM[/CODE]
Now go save it anywhere on your computer (C drive if possible) as [sub]name.bat[/sub] .Go to where you saved it and double click it.Wala!!
